summary: Runtime of the ScriptDragon, you need this in order to run any of the ScriptDragon plugins !
descriptionHtml:
[b]Alyways latest version[/b]
[url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?altname=skyrim_script_dragon]http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?altname=skyrim_script_dragon[/url] 

[b]Script dragon plugins galery[/b]
[url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=script_dragon_plugins]http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=script_dragon_plugins[/url] 

[b]Description[/b]
This is the runtime of the skyrim engine extender (ScriptDragon.dll itself), which allows to use skyrim script functions in 3rd party ScriptDragon plugins. If you want to run Script Dragon plugins you must have this !

[b]Installing[/b]
Copy all contents of the \"bin\" folder to the game folder (where TESV.exe is), if you don\'t need ScriptDragon example plugins (*.asi) you may delete them and corresponding *.ini files. Asi plugins also can be place in the \"<game>\\asi\" folder.

[b]Supported patches[/b]
- 1.4.21.0 
- 1.4.15.0 
- 1.3.10.0 
- 1.3.7.0
- 1.2.12.0
- 1.1.21.0
author: Alexander Blade
